languages.text: Пришло время Вольному Торговцу посетить Дворец Правосудия на Даргонусе и поставить точку в вопросе десятины Простора.
It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.
languages.original_text: Пришло время Вольному Торговцу посетить Дворец Правосудия на Даргонусе и поставить точку в вопросе десятины Простора.

traits.locale_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the Expanse tithe question once and for all.
It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the Expanse tithe question once and for all.

It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

languages.text: Es wird Zeit, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Justizpalast auf Dargonus aufsucht, um die Angelegenheit mit dem Zehnt der Ausdehnung endgültig abzuschließen.
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: Es wird Zeit, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Justizpalast auf Dargonus aufsucht, um die Angelegenheit mit dem Zehnt der Ausdehnung endgültig abzuschließen.

languages.text: L'heure est venue pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de se rendre au palais de justice sur Dargonus pour régler le problème de la dîme dans les Étendues une bonne fois pour toutes.
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: L'heure est venue pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de se rendre au palais de justice sur Dargonus pour régler le problème de la dîme dans les Étendues une bonne fois pour toutes.

languages.text: 行商浪人需要造访达戈努斯的正义大殿，彻底解决科罗努斯扩区的什一税问题。
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人需要造访达戈努斯的正义大殿，彻底解决科罗努斯扩区的什一税问题。
行商浪人需要造访达戈努斯的正义大殿，彻底解决科罗努斯扩区的什一税问题。

languages.text: Es hora de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente visite el Palacio de la Justicia de Dargonus y solucione el asunto del diezmo de la Extensión de una vez por todas.
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: Es hora de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente visite el Palacio de la Justicia de Dargonus y solucione el asunto del diezmo de la Extensión de una vez por todas.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーがダルゴナスの司法宮を訪ね、このエクスパンスの租税に関する問題に完全に片を付ける時が来た。
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーがダルゴナスの司法宮を訪ね、このエクスパンスの租税に関する問題に完全に片を付ける時が来た。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in, Dargonus'taki Adalet Sarayı'na gidip Enginlik aşarı meselesini kökünden çözme vakti geldi.
languages.original_text: It is time for the Rogue Trader to visit the Palace of Justice on Dargonus and settle the matter of the Expanse's tithe once and for all.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in, Dargonus'taki Adalet Sarayı'na gidip Enginlik aşarı meselesini kökünden çözme vakti gelmiştir.
